::Demise::

Demise arrives at Red Bolt's location, seeing a bot missing an arm. 
He steps out of the bushes, although he was too huge for them to hide 
him in the first place.

"You hurt?" he says in a raspy voice, though the answer was obvious.




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Killfest/Demise::
> 
> Killfest smiles, recieving the transmission. New bots were always 
> welcome. He relays an order through his internal communication 
system 
> with his team.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Recieving Killfest's orders, Demise breaks away from the run, 
heading 
> toward the new bot, who wasn't too far away.
